snippet.title: Beneath the Frost | Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3184310/Beneath_the_Frost/

Beneath the Frost is a short, single-player, psychological horror game set on a frozen, desolate planet. You take on the role of the sole survivor of a spacecraft crash, using a robot companion to gather parts for an SOS device while uncovering an eerie mystery that suggests they may not be alone.

Discord: https://discord.gg/notasailorstudios
X: https://x.com/not_sailor
